title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel
body:
There is currently a game breaking bug where the PVP.net Patcher Kernel continuously stops working whenever you try to open the league client.
This error immediately occurs and has only happened since I installed the game onto a new computer, my other computer is still able to open and update with no problem. This is for the OCE client too. Unsure as to whether it is the same for the other regions.
Uninstalling and redownloading the client has come to no avail either.
My guess is it must be something to do with the client installer, which may even be a bit out of date as well as when it is installed the version is from 15th September 2014.

I hope this help describes the problem, and if any other people have had this problem but have been able o fix it, the help would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey kenpachiUzumaki,

Can you try running the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your League of Legends folder and see if the client opens?
woah that actually opens the client and allows it to update, sorry for the super late reply but at this stage thats fixed it! thanks man!!!
